item.title: 2 Stocks to Avoid as Crypto Momentum Wanes
item.description: It's been a rough year for cryptocurrency markets, and you'll want to avoid these crypto-adjacent stocks until the industry sparks a turnaround.

item.title: 3 Dividend Growth Stocks Analysts Are Upgrading for 2026
item.description: United Parcel Service, PepsiCo, and AbbVie are healthy dividend payers whose analyst trends support an outlook for price strength in 2026.

item.title: These 3 Banks Are Rallying Into Year-End, But Will It Continue?
item.description: Bank stocks are rallying into year-end, but while Citi still has momentum and Wells Fargo is ready to play catch up, Goldman’s rally could be topping ...

item.title: 3 Surging Stocks Just Got the Ultimate Stamp of Approval From the S&P 500
item.description: Comfort Systems USA, Carvana, and CRH will join the S&P 500 on Dec. 22 after standout 2025 performances driven by data centers and market share gains.

item.title: This ETF Caught a Major Tailwind After the Fed’s Rate Cut
item.description: Following the Federal Reserve’s third and final interest rate cut of 2025, this financials sector ETF is poised to profit in the year ahead.
